entry.title: Wednesday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 27.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Periods of light snow beginning early this evening. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 early this evening. Low minus 27. Wind chill near minus 38. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Periods of light snow. Temperature falling to minus 30 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending in the morning then clearing. Wind south 20 km/h becoming light near noon. Temperature falling to minus 30 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 36 in the morning and minus 41 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Clear. Low minus 34.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 34. Wind chill minus 41 in the evening and minus 46 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023
